title: Philippines High School Biology II Curriculum Evaluation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Research-based scenario analyzing teacher experiences and self-assessments in the Philippines STEM Track Biology II course

learning_goals: Learners can identify 4 key complex topics (systematics, evolution, biodiversity, genetics) in the Philippine senior high school Biology II curriculum
Learners can interpret teacher self-assessment data using a survey-based ADDIE analysis model
Learners can analyze correlations between educational content difficulty and teacher proficiency using SPSS statistical tools
Learners can propose educational improvement strategies based on research findings in blended learning environments

resources: K-12 Science Curriculum Survey Questionnaire Template
Philippine SHS Biology II Standard Textbook Sample

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
